channel.title: DLF AIG Metadata Application Profile Clearinghouse
channel.description: A Collection of Application Profiles for Digital Collections

image.title: DLF AIG Metadata Application Profile Clearinghouse

item.title: Free mapping: DPLA Metadata Application Profile
item.description:
The DPLA Metadata Application Profile is designed to build on the experience of the Europeana Data Model. In addition, it incorporates feedback from the DPLA community and digital hub pilot participants to create a balanced framework that allows us to accommodate existing and emerging data models for library, archive, and museum resources.
Author: undefined | Section: Digital Public Library of America
Lang: EN | Pages: undefined | Year: 2015
item.dc:creator: DLF AIG Metadata Interest Group

item.title: Free mapping: Mountain West Digital Library Dublin Core Application Profile
item.description:
Created by the Mountain West Digital Library (MWDL) Metadata Working Group in 2009, this profile superseded the Metadata Guidelines for the Mountain West Digital Library (2006).  It is intended to guide the creation of new metadata (i.e., created after June 1, 2010) by members and contributing partners of the MWDL.
Author: undefined | Section: Mountain West Digital Library
Lang: EN | Pages: undefined | Year: 2011
item.dc:creator: DLF AIG Metadata Interest Group

item.title: Free mapping: Rice University Electronic Thesis and Dissertations MAP
item.description:
This document presents existing metadata elements used for the description and long-term stewardship of Rice’s electronic theses and dissertations. This profile is based on recommendations from the Networked Digital Library of Theses and Dissertations' metadata standards for ETDs and the Texas Digital Library's ETD MODS application profile.
Author: undefined | Section: Fondren Library, Rice University
Lang: EN | Pages: undefined | Year: 2014
item.dc:creator: DLF AIG Metadata Interest Group
